author: undetermined
full_text:
Elon Musk's Tesla to set up factory in Gujarat? Minister says 'announcement expected soon'

Elon Musk's Tesla, the electric vehicle (EV) manufacturing giant, is expected to set up its inaugural local manufacturing plant in Gujarat, as per reports. The anticipated announcement is slated for the Vibrant Gujarat Summit in January 2024, and there are expectations that Tesla CEO Elon Musk will be present for the occasion.

Gujarat minister Rushikesh Patel confirmed the same, saying, "It is expected that an announcement will be made in a few days."
title: The anticipated announcement is slated for the Vibrant Gujarat Summit in January 2024, and there are expectations that Tesla CEO Elon Musk will be present for the occasion. Gujarat minister Rushikesh Patel confirmed the same, saying, "It is expected that an announcement will be made in a few days."
vclaim: Tesla is reportedly planning to establish its first local manufacturing plant in Gujarat, India. An official announcement about Tesla's factory in Gujarat is expected to be made during the Vibrant Gujarat Summit in January 2024. Elon Musk is expected to attend the Vibrant Gujarat Summit for the announcement.
